com.vftlite.core

Class VFT

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vftlite.core.VFT

  • public class VFT
extends java.lang.Object

    The VFT core

    VFT is a static class that implements methods to parse and elaborate xml file, jdom Element and Document objects, and Tree objects.

    Author:
    Saverio Meucci

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description
      VFT()

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public static void parse(java.lang.String url,
                         java.lang.String xmlDestinationPath)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        This method serves as an interface for the cli app to parse a mp4-like video container into a xml file.
        Parameters:
        url - The path of the video file.
        xmlDestinationPath - The folder where to save the resulting xml file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • parser

        public static org.jdom2.Element parser(com.coremedia.iso.IsoFile isoFile)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is used to parse a IsoFile into a jdom Element.
        Parameters:
        isoFile - The IsoFile representing the container of the video file.
        Returns:
        A jdom Element.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • batch

        public static void batch(java.lang.String datasetPath,
                         java.lang.String outputPath)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        This method servers as an interface for the cli app to parse a directory of video file containers. It also considers sufolders and recreates the same folder structure for the outputted xml files.
        Parameters:
        datasetPath - The path of the folder that needs to be parsed.
        outputPath - The folder where the xml files will be saved.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • parseDirectory

        public static void parseDirectory(java.io.File folder,
                                  java.lang.String outputPath)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is used to parse a directory of video file containers. It also considers subfolders and recreates the same folder structure for the outputted xml files.
        Parameters:
        folder - A File objects representing the folder under consideration.
        outputPath - The path where to save the xml files.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • draw

        public static void draw(java.lang.String url,
                        java.lang.String name)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        This method serves as an interface for the cli app to draw a tree into a JFrame window, given an xml file.
        Parameters:
        url - The path of the xml file.
        name - The name of the window.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

                                 throws java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • buildTree

        public static Tree buildTree(org.jdom2.Element root,
                             Tree father,
                             int level)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is used to build a Tree object, given a jdom Element.
        Parameters:
        root - The jdom Element to represent.
        father - A Tree object representing the father.
        level - An integer representing the level of depth of the Tree object.
        Returns:
        A Tree object representing a jdom Element.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • merge

        public static void merge(java.lang.String a,
                         java.lang.String b,
                         java.lang.String xmlDestinationPath,
                         boolean withAttributes)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        This method serves as an interface to merge two xml file into a single one. Can consider tag only and also attributes values.
        Parameters:
        a - The path of the first xml file.
        b - The path of the second xml file.
        xmlDestinationPath - The path where to save the merged xml file.
        withAttributes - A boolean to determined is attributes need to be considered.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • mergeTree

        public static void mergeTree(Tree config,
                             Tree tree,
                             boolean withAttributes)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Given two Tree objects, merge them into a the first Tree object. Can consider tag only and also attributes values.
        Parameters:
        config - The Tree object that will be updated by the second.
        tree - The Tree object to merge.
        withAttributes - Whether or not consider attributes.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • checkAttributes

        public static void checkAttributes(Tree config,
                                   Tree node)
        This method, given two Tree objects with the same name and at the same level, check if attributes are equals. If an attributes of the second Tree object contains a value that is not present for the same attribute in the first Tree object, adds that new value to the attribute of the first Tree object.
        Parameters:
        config - The Tree object that will be updated by the second.
        tree - The Tree object to merge.

      • formatFieldValues

        public static java.lang.String formatFieldValues(java.util.List<java.lang.String> values)
        Format attributes value, when a new value is added.
        Parameters:
        values - A list of string of new values for an attribute.
        Returns:
        A formatted string that represents the new value for an attribute of the first Tree object.

      • checkTrakType

        public static java.lang.String checkTrakType(Tree trak)
        This method is used to determine the type of the Tree with name "trak".
        Parameters:
        trak - The Tree object with name "trak".
        Returns:
        The type of the trak; empty if the type cannot be determined.

      • update

        public static void update(java.lang.String datasetPath,
                          java.lang.String outputPath,
                          boolean withAttributes)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        This method servers as an interface for the cli app to merge all xml files of a directory into one. It also considers subfolders. Can consider tag only and also attributes values.
        Parameters:
        datasetPath - The path of the folder containing the xml files.
        outputPath - The path where to save the merged xml files.
        withAttributes - Whether or not consider attributes.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • updateConfig

        public static void updateConfig(Tree config,
                                java.lang.String datasetPath,
                                boolean withAttributes)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is used to create a Tree object by merging all xml files in a given folder. Can consider tag only and also attributes values.
        Parameters:
        config - The Tree object that represent the merging.
        datasetPath - The path of the folder containing the xml files.
        withAttributes - Wheter or not consider the attributes.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
